abstracted_objective: Start a sequential code flow, with multiple subtasks performed in turn
Combine aggregation of composite quantities with derivation of quantitative measures to resolve unknown components and compute required values.
Evaluate a collection of elements against defined criteria and identify, select, or rank those that satisfy the specified requirements.
Identify and select one or more candidates from a set of options that simultaneously satisfy multiple specified criteria through comparative evaluation.
End of the current sequential code flow.
